description:
In this course, you will learn how to create a business card, this course is for beginners, so easy to follow. you will learn about:

  • size for business cards
  • create templates for business cards
  • write the details for a business card
  • create a simple logo design
  • make business cards front and back
  • change the format to print

This course will help you to become a graphic designer, let's start learning.
title: Adobe Illustrator for print design
